commit message: Clean up some warnings.
Handle browser HTTP intents for links to xkcd.com.
New option to reopen last read comic on start.
Little UI redesign, making space for bookmarks and archives.
Add link to comic list / archive
Add a ListActivity for the XKCD archive. UI still a little horrible, and will be fixed when bookmark icons are added to the archive list.
Enable debuggable on master branch.
Disable debuggable on release branch.
Fix archive list scrape for when ISP concatenates lines.
Add a donate option to menu.
Add about dialog.

Can now star comics in viewer and archive. TODO: make a way to view just the bookmarked comics; make it so that other currently open activities' bookmark stars are updated when starring/unstarring something?
Merge branch 'master' into release
Added Randall Munroe to the about page. Forgot about that. Oops.
Add a way to view favorites (bookmarks / starred comics).
Simple substring search by title.
Merge branch 'master' into release
Adding project properties to git repo to allow versioning.
Merge branch 'master' into release

Set installLocation=auto and build target as android-8 (2.2), but leave minSdkVersion as 3 (1.5). This is so we can allow install to SD card, while maintaining backwards compatibility with pre-2.2 devices.
Fix html entities / character encodings once and for all. Much simpler solution. Just wish I'd found it earlier. :(
Merge branch 'master' into release
Increase version number to 2.0.
Merge branch 'master' into release
